title: Saag aloo with roasted gobi curry
description: This take on an Indian potato and cauliflower curry is a brilliant meal to make on the cheap.Each serving provides 342kcal, 11g protein, 41g carbohydrate (of which 11g sugars), 13g fat (of which 4g saturates), 9g fibre and 0.7g salt.
ingredients: salt and freshly ground black pepper
3 potatoes, peeled and cut into 2cm/1in cubes
